scripts.test: watchify *.spec.js -v -o test/suite.js & livereload test/ & http-server test/ -o
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: git stash && browserify *.spec.js -v -o test/suite.js && cp -r test temp && git checkout gh-pages && mv temp/* . && rm -rf temp && git commit -am 'Automatic gh-pages deploy' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout -
